Text:
For everyone currently downloading this...

         Don't worry about how slow this is going. I am the only seeder and there are tons of you guys. just hold on and you'll finish eventually. but please, when you finish, seed as long as possible so that others can enjoy this great show.
Please seed! Will seed to 10 Ratio AT LEAST!
Heyy, great quality! Thanks a lot! It has been hard to find a good quality uncensored version of this show, so thank you! Slow download but completely worth it.
Anyone else have issue with all the audio commentary over the sketches? Makes them basically worthless for actually watching the show unless it can be turned off.
Actually I couldn't get the commentary to work...
Thanks guys. I'm gettin 1.7 MB/s download speed. I'll be sure to seed about ten times. :)
Thanks so much. I'm amazed at the depth of DLs this brain trust puts together. I'll Seed as long as I can. Great show. TPB > Netflix
